newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: BWT H1 profits jump over falling sales.
newsitem.headline: BWT H1 profits jump over falling sales.

text.p: BWT AG, Europe's major water treatment company, on Thursday said group pre-tax profit in the first six months jumped 55 percent while sales slid 11 percent.
Pre-tax profit climbed to 96 million schillings from 62 million in the year-ago period, net profit rose to 50 million from 31 million, while sales fell to 1.07 billion from 1.2 billion.

BWT said it expected to pay out a bonus dividend on top of a 25 schilling dividend for the full year. It gave not further details. In 1995, BWT paid out a 27 schilling dividend. -- Julia Ferguson, Vienna newsroom, +431 531 12 254
